comment: If a class is a subclass of another class, then its power class is a subclass of that other class's power class. Left-to-right implication of Exercise 18 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 18. Proof derived by completeusersproof.c from User's Proof in VirtualDeductionProofs.txt. The User's Proof in html format is displayed in ~ http://us.metamath.org/other/completeusersproof/sspwimpaltvd.html . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 11-Sep-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
